input-new.description:
There is no DEMO Hospital. 
Enter a hospital name and register DEMO hospital.

Hospital's Key will be saved on this browser, and one's address will be registered to blockchain for DEMO.

err-name-too-long.title: Input Error
err-name-too-long.msg: Hospital Name must be 32 bytes or less.

input-patient-address.description: For DEMO, the patient's address will be directly set from this browser's localstorage.

err-no-hospital.title: No Hospital Registered
err-no-hospital.msg:
DEMO hospital has not been registered.
Please register a hospital in advance.

create-new.title: Doctor Registration
create-new.msg:
DEMO doctor has not been registered yet.
Do you create DEMO doctor?

write-complete.title: Written Successfully
write-complete.msg: Medical record has been written successfully.

content.no-hospital-registered: Hospital for DEMO has not been registerd.

input-new.description:
There is no DEMO Patient. 
Enter patient's informations and register DEMO patient.

Patient's Key will be saved on this browser, and one's informations will be saved with access control on the blockchain for DEMO.

allow-access-to-hospital.submit: Add Read/Write auth to the hospital. (As read with QR code)

deny-access-from-hospital.submit: Remove Read/Write auth from the hospital. (As read with QR code)

add-permission.title: Add Permission Successfully
add-permission.msg: Add read/write permission to DEMO hospital Successfully.

remove-permission.title: Remove Permission Successfully
remove-permission.msg: Remove read/write permission from DEMO hospital Successfully.
